Package slotmachine.view

Interface GameCallback

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConsoleLoggerCallback
    public interface GameCallback
    The callback interface in Further Programming Assignment

    The methods is this interface are called upon as specified in the SlotMachineEngine interface

    In Assignment 1 this class is implemented as ConsoleLoggerCallback.

    Author:
    Ross Nye
    See Also:
    SlotMachine

        void addCredits​(Player player,
                int credits)
        Updates the view when player adds credits
        Parameters:
        player - the player to which credits were added
        credits - the amount of credits added
        See Also:

      • betUpdated

        void betUpdated​(Player player,
                int amount,
                LineNum line)
        Updates the view when the players bets are updated
        Parameters:
        player - the current player
        amount - the amount bet
        line - the line number bet on
        See Also:
        SlotMachine.placeBet(int), SlotMachine.placeBet(int, LineNum)

      • betUpdated

        void betUpdated​(Player player,
                int amount,
                java.util.Collection<LineNum> lines)
        Updates the view when the players bets are updated
        Parameters:
        player - the current player
        amount - the amount bet
        lines - the set of line numbers bet on
        See Also:
        SlotMachine.placeBet(int, java.util.Set), SlotMachine.placeBet(int, LineNum...)

      • turnWheel

        void turnWheel​(Wheel wheel,
               int turnNum)
        Updates the view each time one of the wheel spins on turn (slot) during a spin
        Parameters:
        wheel - the wheel that was turned
        turnNum - the turn number of the spin
        See Also:
        SlotMachine.spin(int, int), SlotMachine.spinToWin(int, int)

      • spinComplete

        void spinComplete​(SpinResult spinResult)
        Updates the view with the state of the three wheels (and their five lines) at the completion of a spin.
        Parameters:
        spinResult - the SpinResult used to represent the five lines of the wheel at the completion of a spin

      • lineResult

        void lineResult​(Player player,
                boolean hasBet,
                int lineOutcome,
                SlotLine slotLine)
        Updates the view with the state and outcome of each line when applying betting result for each line
        Parameters:
        player - the current player
        hasBet - true if there was a bet placed on the line, otherwise false
        lineOutcome - the resulting outcome for each line (0 for no win /loss)
        slotLine - the SlotLine object representing the line
        See Also:
        SlotMachine.applySpinResult(SpinResult), SlotMachine.spinToWin(int, int)

      • betTotals

        void betTotals​(Player player,
               int total)
        Updates the view with the overall outcome (total) when applying betting results
        Parameters:
        player - the current player
        total - the total amount won (0 if no line bet won)
        See Also:
        SlotMachine.applySpinResult(SpinResult), SlotMachine.spinToWin(int, int)
